akn:content.akn:p: (a) Partnership agreements authorized The Secretary may enter into a partnership agreement with an eligible partner to implement a project that will assist producers with installing and maintaining an eligible activity on eligible land.
(d) Duties of Secretary The Secretary shall—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Nonapplicability of adjusted gross income limitation

akn:content.akn:p: (f) Nonapplicability of adjusted gross income limitation The adjusted gross income limitation described in section 1308–3a(b)(1) of title 7 shall not apply to an eligible partner under the program.
